Name: AshenRustedArmor.ArmoryContent
Description:
The Frontier War never ended. The collapse of the IMC brought a tide of new conflict as its subsidiaries fought tooth and nail over the dissolved mega-conglomerate's property. With this came the creation of weapons the likes of which had never before been seen...

This mod significantly expands upon the content of the base game, adding new weapons, new titans, and much more.

Credit to:
	TheAvaliEngineer - Mod Author/Lead Developer
	GalacticMoblin - Developer (Balance, Bugfixes, Filestructure)
	EXRILL - Contributor (SFX, Particles)
	SeQwin - Contributor (Localisation)
	BaconVigilante - Tester
	Ivan4ik - Contributor (Crosshairs)
